title: Definition namespace for attributes describing the target component of an integration integration.
description: This section details integration target attributes like name, description and type among other.

name.title: The name of the ETL target. Contains no spaces.
name.description: The name of the ETL target. It should be a commonly used singular noun and be unique within a solution.

description.title: The description of the ETL target.
description.description: A phrase describing the ETL target.

tableOptions.title: Definition namespace for a database table integration target.
tableOptions.description: This section specified attributes related to an integration target of type Database Table. Attributes include the table name that will be updated.

tableName.title: The name of the table to update.
tableName.description: The table that will be updated on the target database.

schemaName.title: Schema Name
schemaName.description: The name of the schema in which the table resides.

watermark.title: Definition namespace for watermark columns on the integration target data.
watermark.description: This section lists the column(s) on the target data used to determine whether a record is new or has been updated.

sequentialKeyColumns.title: Sequential key column used for watermark purpose.
sequentialKeyColumns.description: Specify one or more sequential key columns to be compared to source data to determine if a record exits in the target.

dateColumns.title: Column(s) in datetime format used for watermark purpose.
dateColumns.description: List of datetime columns to be compared to source data to determine if data has changed.

dataConnectionName.title: The name of the integration target data connection. Contains no spaces.
dataConnectionName.description: The name should be a commonly used singular noun and be unique within a solution.

name.title: The name of the ETL target. Contains no spaces.
name.description: The name of the ETL target. It should be a commonly used singular noun and be unique within a solution.

description.title: The description of the ETL target.
description.description: A phrase describing the ETL target.

messageBrokerOptions.title: Definition namespace for a Message Queue integration target.
messageBrokerOptions.description: This section specified attributes related to an integration target of type Message Broker. Attributes include the name of the target queue or topic.

targetName.title: The target name.
targetName.description: The name of the queue, topic or subscription to which messages will be sent.

dataConnectionName.title: The name of the integration target data connection. Contains no spaces.
dataConnectionName.description: The name should be a commonly used singular noun and be unique within a solution.
